title: Perform Structural Steel Simulation
description: A structural engineer needs to perform a finite element analysis (FEA) on a complex steel connection to verify it can handle the design loads.

tasks.description: Import the geometry of the steel connection from the CAD model into the FEA software.
Apply the material properties for steel and the design loads (e.g., tension, shear) as specified in the design basis.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly sets up the simulation parameters.

tasks.description: Run the simulation and analyze the stress results to ensure they are below the material's allowable limits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs the analysis and the results show that the maximum stress is within acceptable safety factors.
